note:
Since 1974 I've lived by a bend of the river, 90 miles from New York City, on the forested edge of the Bos-Wash Corridor. I settled in among the bears and the eagles and raised two children to swim like the fishes.

Great-GrandMother, born at CO2 level 310.3 ppm

Spillway News :
I hope the Riverkeepers arrive soon :-) Delaware, Hudson, hello?
